eas_text: A civil authority has issued A LOCAL AREA EMERGENCY for the following counties or areas: Skagit, WA; at 04:26 AM ON DEC 10, 2025 Effective until 05:26 AM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: The following message is being sent on behalf of Skagit County Emergency Management.  Skagit Ready Alert: Upriver Communities GET SET for Imminent Evacuation. Historic flooding expected on Skagit and Sauk Rivers. Pack your go bag, prepare your property, and BE PREPARED TO EVACUATE. Roads may be closed due to high water, plan your route to high ground away from the river.
